explains: n. 对白；对话，交换意见
v. <美>（为解决问题而）参加对话，进行讨论；<美>为（电影、戏剧）配上对白

sentences.en: The play was full of slangy dialogue.
sentences.cn: 剧中充斥了大量俚语对话。

sentences.en: The dialogue was all filth and innuendo.
sentences.cn: 这段对话全是下流的言辞和影射。

sentences.en: They were substituting violence for dialogue.
sentences.cn: 他们那时在以暴力代替对话。
